input.sentences: there was a large party being held near the college
a blonde girl pulls a treat out from the tray at the college party .
[female] | having a conversation about a book

output.sentences: A group of college students held a party in their dorm.
One of the girls at the party pulls a treat from the tray.
One of the females at the party is having a conversation with others at the party about the book she has read.
There are a group of people at the party hanging out in the kitchen having a couple of drinks.
There are a lot of plastic cups lined up at the party like the college students will soon play a game of beer pong.
